description: landscape with Louis XIV and cavalrymen in the left foreground; beyond bridge spannig a river, at center by the roadside the priory of Fives; in the distance the city of Lille; two sheets are attached together
marks:
Inscription

lower left corner, in pencil: [HK];
title: Vue de la ville de L'Isle du costé du Prieuré de Fives, et l'armée du Roi devant la place, en l'année 1667/Urbis Insularum, excrcitusq. regii urbem obsidentis ex agro Fibiense prospectus, anno 1667/ Conquêtes et batailles de Louis XIV
